subject: Re: [junit] Re: Suggestion: New addition to the Assert class
msgSnippet: Oh, did that change while I wasn t paying attention? Cool. (Point 1, I mean.) So said  Vladimir R. Bossicard  on  2/12/2003 -------------------- ... library)
messageBody:
Oh, did that change while I wasn't paying attention? Cool. (Point 1, I
mean.)

So said Vladimir R. Bossicard on 2/12/2003 --------------------

>I forgot to mention:
>
>"if an exception occured in setUp() method"...
>
>> tearDown is:
>>
>> - always called in the TestCase
>> - never called in the junit.extensions.TestSetup
>> BUT
>> - always called in the junitx.extensions.TestSetup (JUnit-addons
library)
>
>-Vladimir
>
